scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && npm run formatjs
scripts.coverage-report: npm run build && npm run nobuild:coverage-report
scripts.coverage-html: npm run build && npm run nobuild:coverage-html
scripts.coverage: npm run build && npm run nobuild:coverage
scripts.format:ci: npm run prettier -- --check && npm run prettierjs -- --check
scripts.integration: npm run build && npm run nobuild:integration
scripts.nobuild:coverage: npm run build:tests && nyc --check-coverage --branches 85 --functions 90 --lines 90 mocha && npm run clean:jstests
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run format:ci && npm run lint && npm run nobuild:coverage
scripts.unit: npm run build && npm run nobuild:unit
